text: Hey all! I am seeking a career change to content marketing writing after 15 years as a digital manager. I do some freelance writing for clients but am thinking I need to be full time to really grow my skills and experience. I am curious from practicing content writers out there and managers who hire writers — what do strong resumes for writing positions look like? Do you recommend having a portfolio? If you are a writer or someone who hires writers can you share examples of strong resumes and portfolios? Thanks much!

elements.text: Hey all! I am seeking a career change to content marketing writing after 15 years as a digital manager. If you are a writer or someone who hires writers can you share examples of strong resumes and portfolios? Thanks much!

text: I've been a writer fr 7+ years, biggest thing that's gotten me great projects are the ability to share specific results your content achieved and samples directly relevant to the brand you're potentially working with. I may have freelancer needs over the next month so if you have samples and resume feel free to DM me.
